component.name: HomeScene
component.script:
'** '** Example: Edit the Label component with BrightScript '**
function init() print "homeScene.init()" scene = m.top m.list = scene.findNode("categoriesList") m.list.setFocus(true) m.listContents = m.list.findNode("categoriesListItems")
newListItem = createObject("roSGNode", "ContentNode") newListItem.setFields({"title":"JEFF"}) m.listContents.appendChild(newListItem)
newListItem = createObject("roSGNode", "ContentNode") newListItem.setFields({"title":"CHRIS"}) m.listContents.insertChild(newListItem, 0)
'Set the font size 'm.myLabel.font.size=92
'Set the color to light blue 'm.myLabel.color="0x72D7EEFF"
m.list.observeField("itemSelected", "itemSelectedChanged")
'** '** The full list of editable attributes can be located at: '** http://sdkdocs.roku.com/display/sdkdoc/Label#Label-Fields '** end function
function itemSelectedChanged() print "itemSelected =" + stri(m.list.itemSelected) print "itemSelected.title = " + m.listContents.getChild(m.list.itemSelected).title grid = m.top.findNode("theGrid") grid.setFocus(true) grid.jumpToItem = 7 end function
